S02bsu017_u:9: tasmai namaskṛtvā idamāryāvalokiteśvaramukhodgīrṇaṃ vajradharamahīyaṃ hayagrīvaṃ nāma paramahṛdayamāvartayiṣyāmisarvakarmārthasādhakam /
S02bsu017_u:11: amoghaṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ viṣāṇāṃ ca nāśakam / tadyathā
S02bsu017_u:12_0: om tarula tarula vitarula vitarula sarvaviṣaghātaka jvalitavisphuliṅgāṭṭahāsa kesarāṭopapravṛddhavega
S02bsu017_u:12_3: paramaśāntikarasarvagrahapraśamanakara budhya budhya dhāva dhāva ca bhagavā hayagrīva
S02bsu017_u:13: rakṣa rakṣa kṣamasva kṣamasva sa mayābhihitāṃ mantrām /
S02bsu017_u:15: ghorapiśāca sarvagraheṣvapratihato mama varavajradaṃṣṭra kiṃ cirāpayasi /
S02bsu017_u:16: idaṃ duṣṭagrahaṃ duṣṭasattvaṃ duṣṭapiśācaṃ vā dhuna dhuna vidhuna vidhuna kampa kampa matha matha pramatha pramatha /
S02bsu017_u:17: tathāgatājñāṃ pālaya buddhadharmasaṃghānujñātaṃ me karma śīghraṃ (Hgv 44)
S02bsu017_u:19: hayagrīvāya phaṭ vajrakhurāya phaṭ vajradaṃṣṭrāya phaṭ vajradaṃṣṭrotkaṭabhayabhairavāya phaṭ /
S02bsu017_u:27: yāvanto mamaye kecitahitaiṣiṇastān sarvān vaḍavāmukhena nikṛntaya phaṭ /
S02bsu017_u:29: sidhyantu mama maṃtrapadā hayagrīvo bhagavān ājñāpayati svāhā /
S02bsu017_u:30: ayaṃ hayagrīvavidyā rājā paṭhitasiddhaḥ upacāraḥ ātmarakṣājāpena pararakṣā paṃcaraṃgīsūtram ekaviṃśatigranthayaḥ kṛtvā bandhitavyam /
S02bsu017_u:33: sarvaparakṛtā maṃtrāśchinnā bhavanti sarvaśatravastambhanaṃ manasā vyavahāre svakham mukhe kṛtvā vidyā japtayā uttarāyati /
S02bsu017_u:34: spṛṣṭāveśaneṣusnātaṃ śucivastraprāvṛtaṃ śucau pradeśe sumanasāsaṃbaddhā āveśaye śuklavaliryathālaṃbhena /
S02bsu017_u:35: candragrahe sūryagrahe ghṛtaṃ tāmrabhājane kṛtvā tāvajjepadyāvaccandro mukto bhavati taṃ ghṛtaṃ pive medhāvī bhavati ekenoddeśena ślokaśatamudgṛṇhāti /
S02bsu017_u:48: bhasmanā sarṣapeṇa udakena sapta japtena rakṣā kartavyā /
